name: Autumn Dye
flavorText: The monks from the Order of Yir crush the first orange leaves of autumn into tea, and apply it to their robes during the Ceremony of the Harvest Moon.
flavorTextHtml: The monks from the Order of Yir crush the first orange leaves of autumn into tea, and apply it to their robes during the Ceremony of the Harvest Moon.
description: Changes the color of a single piece of armor.
descriptionHtml: Changes the color of a single piece of armor.
